ygData.subject: Re: Real Role Players?!
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, real role-players do exist in EQ. It s just we re few and far between. You ve got to keep your eyes out for em. Sometimes you ll find whole guilds of
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, real role-players do exist in EQ. It's just
we're few and far between. You've got to keep your eyes
out for 'em. Sometimes you'll find whole guilds of
RPers.<br><br>As to IC and OOC terms: in EQ, sometimes you just
HAVE to use an OOC term when in character. This helps
prevent confusion on what you're talking about. Asking
someone their season or rank instead of level is
fine...but shouting Train! or Zone! is necessary to avoid
having to describe to someone what the hell is going
on.<br><br>Tyral Stormfang<br>Retired
